comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Joseph Gurney Gannon (1836-1926), Illinois congressman and Speaker of the House: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Gurney_Cannon If this was taken in April 1914 as it says, he was 77 at the time. He's also famous for being featured on the cover of the very first issue of Time Magazine (in 1923): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Time_Magazine_-_first_cover.jpg

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the information about congressman Joseph Gurney Cannon which includes many other photographs of him.  We will include some of it in the description when we update.
